effect.ruby_sapphire: User copies the target’s species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves. Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining. IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.

IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated. choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
short_effect.emerald: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

short_effect.colosseum: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Alters the user’s cells to become a copy of the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Alters the user’s cells to become a copy of the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user transforms into a copy of the foe with even the same move set.
